name: Plankton Simulator
description:
This is Simulator Game about a Zooplankton, made using Raylib, in which you have to eat Phytoplankton. But, Remember you are not at the top of marine food chain, there still are other fishes that can "Eat you".


Left arrow Key or "A" to rotate Counter-Clockwise,

Right arrow Key or "D" to rotate Clockwise.
